content: watch on youtube 1 crochet with me mushroom chapstick holder tools crochet hook - 2 75mm/c scissors yarn needle yarn yarn bee bamboo-tiful or any yarn roughly 227 yards per 100 grams 257 yards per 4 oz for a similar feel i think coboo would be a good alternative stitches & abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease skip - skip stitck chain - chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loops only - repeat stitches inside as many time as stated or around notes this is a second version of my original magical mushroom lanyard pattern unfortunately i wrote that pattern not expecting many people to use it and it was more difficult than it should have been for this pattern set i will be using more common stitches and hopefully writing it in a way that is easy for people to read use and change all caps will be made with single_crochet stitches with rounds ending with a slip_stitch and starting with a chain one caps are worked top down bodies are worked from the bottom up 1 https //youtu be/fbycbx5-g18
